lender.name: Shasta
lender.loan_because: I want to help others like me who may not have as many options as I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker for my two children and a collage student.

lender.name: Mozelle
lender.loan_because:
If it only takes as little as $25 to make someones life better, then that is something I can afford to do on my budget. I loan because I believe I can help someones life, dreams, and hopes manifest and be fruitful. Blessings come in many different ways and maybe my giving is someone elses blessing. Im sure it will come back to me as a blessing in some way. It doesnt matter where you are in the World, your Ethnicity, your Spiritual Beliefs we are all Family. Many small blessing can equal a truly large blessing for someone in need. Just have faith and be patient and you will see how things work-out.
It doesnt matter how big or small the Kiva Community you join. We are all supply Economic Life Support to people in need.
I invite you to join the community team I've created: ECO LIFE SUPPORT .
Thank You! Mozelle

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: microlending is an effective tool to help people improve their lives. better than charity because recyclable and recipients are proactive

lender.name: Derek
lender.occupational_info: Acrylic and Fresh Touch Fashions aims to build a new generation of clothing that caters to many diverse markets, age groups and emerging fashion trends. In addition, all of my work focuses on valuing the richness and diversity of every individual while continually gearing serviced to enhance local communities and the greater world. Essentially, my goals are to become a premier, yet independent retailer of highly fashionable items while placing a strong emphasis on delivering the uttermost quality, value and customer relationship management (CRM) within the retail industry.

lender.name: Jessie
lender.loan_because: People should have the same opportunities as I would, and receiving a helping hand could make the difference between opening a new door as opposed to closing one.

lender.name: Shawn, Annie & Anastasia
lender.loan_because: We are lower class economically in the United states but realize this still means on a global scale we are people of privilege. We believe in giving back to the world community in the small ways we can.
lender.occupational_info: Shawn is Native American and works to help his people recover from the results of genocide and oppression. Annie is a grant writer and artist who strives to provide opportunities for youth to get involved in art she also volunteers with foster babies providing the love and care every child needs. Anastasia is our daughter, she wants to help people and animals.

lender.loan_because: They can make a better use of money than I can.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: someone gave me a gift certificate! but now I plan to continue - this is wonderful.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I find the concept of micro finance like this very interesting, though I have little experience with investment. I hope to learn some good life lessons.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of recycling and trash for a woman in my neighborhood. In the winter I offer snow shoveling service. I've had a number of odd jobs, but my main occupation now is working as a student at Lafayette College.

lender.name: Frauen in Burgdorf
lender.occupational_info: Iam working for womens rights

lender.name: Odette
lender.loan_because: I am truly blessed to be where I am in my life and had a lot of help along the way. This is a small way in which I can help someone else. I feel compelled to do more but this is a start.
lender.occupational_info: I give pilots instructions to: takeoff, get the airplane up in the air, instructions to fly it from one place to another and then instrucstions to land the airplane on the ground.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: Good Tea Advice for those who love tea and those just starting to enjoy tea, from Black tea to White tea and all in between

lender.name: Mishcon de Reya
lender.loan_because: We provide micro-financing because, as a Firm, we are committed to giving time and money to worthy causes. Additionally we identify with the entrepreneurial sprit demonstrated by those applying for Kiva loans.
lender.occupational_info:
Mishcon de Reya is a law firm, with offices in London and New York, which provides a wide range of legal services to companies and individuals. In every area of the law that we operate, Mishcon de Reya prides itself in providing a best in class service to its clients.
Our clients are dynamic and sophisticated and we reflect that in our belief in challenging the conventional or accepted ways of working. An entrepreneurial spirit - where candour and involvement are key - characterises our ability to develop and execute the strategies required to achieve our clients goals quickly.
Mishcon de Reya is proactive in the area of corporate responsibility. The Firm was one of the first in the UK to become carbon neutral and has been dedicated to pro bono work for many years.
Mishcommunity, our Corporate Social Responsibility Programme, was created to formalise our commitment to give time and money to good causes and to manage the social and environmental impact of our day-to-day activities.

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: To support self-sufficiency in the world.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed in my life and I feel that I should pass those blessings on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I build farm machinery that plants the seeds that grows the crops that feed the world. I also build the machinery that harvest the crops that feed the world. I work for John Deere as a welder.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Drape's World History
lender.loan_because: This was part of a project we did on microfinance and the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: Our work in world history is to connect our content learning to real-world situations, and take action as we can to impact our world.

lender.name: Ken Deffenbacher
lender.loan_because: I want to become a good ancestor, someone our great-grandchildren will be proud to say they knew.
lender.occupational_info: Even though I'm as busy now as when I was working, I enjoy co-chairing our church's Earth stewardship program with our friend Glenn, a longtime prairie conservationist and environmental advocate. Another local green project we take part in, along with a lot of other volunteers of all ages, is the Adopt-a-Stream/Adopt-a-Park program. We've signed on to become Master Naturalists, a program that will begin this summer in Nebraska that requires classroom as well as in-the-field education. We're members of Nature Conservancy, Fontenelle Forest Nature Association, Heron Haven, Dundee Community Garden and other dynamic green groups. A lot of good things are beginning to happen in our part of the world.

lender.name: Chae
lender.loan_because: I see the potential.
lender.occupational_info: I look for opportunities that cause change.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It was part of my upbringing...it is just what you do. The highest form of tzedakah is enabling the recipient to become self-reliant.

lender.loan_because: I've seen firsthand while traveling in Chiapas, Mexico the difference a small loan can make to individuals and to their community.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software that makes information available through libraries to their patrons around the world.

lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer screen all day making pretty images to convince people to take care of themselves and go to the doctor. I am also an animal lover who raises service dogs for Canine Companions for Independence (cci.org) and have many more pets at home.

lender.occupational_info: I have many identities, but I think that here I'm trying to just be a human with some extra resources helping another human in need. Honestly, it's really hard to keep it that simple, but I think there's power in focusing on the common denominator. And our humanity is the HIGHEST common denominator. Be well folks.

lender.loan_because: We need to lovingly support one another as best we can.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with enough, and I want to give back.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: To me, Kiva proves that the cumulation of many small efforts can have a significant impact. I want to do my part to help people who are willing to work hard have a chance to improve their lives - and to remind myself not to take for granted the fact we Americans have that opportunity.

lender.name: Jeffrey P.
lender.loan_because: this is an innovative way to get money directly to those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: legal

lender.name: Takashi
lender.loan_because: I want to help others with their businesses and their lives.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I received help getting my business up and running and I'd like to help other entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Harvestant
lender.loan_because: 1) I want the practice. 2) Helping others gives my life meaning.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: greed is cliche.

lender.name: Tammie & Greg Sr
lender.loan_because: Alessa, my niece in Montreal, gave us a Kiva gift certificate. And as co-lender (also a CHW) my wife Tammie is originally from Santa Catalina, Ilocos Sur, The Philippines. Latter inspires our first loan to a fellow Filipina. When we have money available to share, it feels much better knowing about the specific needs and goals of individual borrower ---which should help improve their financial, household & personal life situations.
lender.occupational_info: [Greg Sr] As a member of a Community Health Service home care team in Richmond, BC (British Columbia provincial government -funded), I do one-to-one home visits to assist elders & incapacitated people with their personal care / bathing, some meal prep and exercise / walking. I'm also a member & Shop Steward of UFCW Local 1518 representing fellow CHWs. I love my work: it is such a Blessing to be well-paid and also to enjoy daily great satisfaction in supporting and upgrading state of my clients' personal & home lives. As I work, I love listening to clients' wonderful life stories---personal histories: much more interesting & vivid than any books. In short, my work opens my heart and continues my education & consciousness-raising as a human being. Thank God and keep counting all His Blessings!

lender.name: joy4u

lender.occupational_info: You know those big trucks from MAN that transport goods and all kinds of stuff? I build them together with thousands of people in Europe, South Africa, Brasil and India.

lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse-I work in substance abuse and mental health-I love my work-I went to nursing school at age 50-

lender.name: Art
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with the ability to do so! Because every little bit helps! Because if all of us who have more than we need gave more to those in need, we could actually end this "need divide"!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a high-school, and I teach math, history, and creative writing. I am also an artist...I sing, perform poetry, and I am also an actor!

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: It just seems to be the right thing to do. I don't have a lot but I can help a little.

lender.occupational_info: I try to supply the information needs of kids and adults through reading materials and research.

lender.name: Ari
lender.loan_because: with a busy schedule, this is the best and most efficient way to help someone in need.

lender.loan_because: It is a grand opportunity to help those that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the US Coast Guard.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: The best charity in the world, is helping people help themselves.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.occupational_info: a hell of a lot of fun. I work on a farm, and I highly recommend it - beats a cubicle any day!!!

lender.occupational_info: "Fabricas de los Sonrisas" (Makers of Smiles) - social action through clowning to get close and spread joy to adults and children in hospitals, poor neighborhoods, schools and nursing homes in developing countries.

lender.name: Guus
lender.loan_because: I would want to support women as the cornerstone of society and their iron will to stand up for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I mainly analyze drug concentrations in blood samples from patients receiving this medication to combat HIV, tuberculosis and fungal infections.

lender.name: Eden
lender.loan_because: i want to be helpful to other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a third grader, and my hobbies are acting, singing ,dancing and skiing.

lender.name: LMF
lender.loan_because: God has provided so much to me, my family, and friends; and we'd like to bless others as much as we've been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching compassion, faith, and grace to teenagers is something they need to see modeled for them on a daily basis.

lender.name: Willard
lender.loan_because: As the director of a non profit I work with people who must struggle to make their modest dreams for their family come true. Here is an opportunity to help someone do the same for their family half way across the world. It is rewarding to know that I can make a difference for them and their community in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I run an organization of volunteers who help people learn to read and write. Many are immigrants from other countries who need to learn English so that they can be successful here.

lender.name: Micky
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to honor God by serving others with these loans.
